skills.name: tailwind-v4
skills.author: existential-birds
skills.description: Tailwind CSS v4 with CSS-first configuration and design tokens. Use when setting up Tailwind v4, defining theme variables, using OKLCH colors, or configuring dark mode. Triggers on @theme, @tailwindcss/vite, oklch, CSS variables, --color-, tailwind v4.

commands.add: npx skills add existential-birds/beagle --skill tailwind-v4 -a claude-code -y
